Articles.Content:
I was really bored today.

I^3 Parachutes

This started mostly because I wanted to make my own canopies. Which ended up into making one for each size rocket. But with eight parachutes in the Utilities menu looking the same, I needed an easy way to identify them--I ended up with a retexture of the parachute parts and I messed with the configs a bit. I'll probably do the stock radial parachutes tomorrow in a similar color scheme to match.

To me, a .0625m parachute shouldn't create the same drag as the 1.25m parachute, which wouldn't create the same drag as a 3.75m parachute. Since the canopy scales with the part, I scaled the drag of each parachute. It's going to need some balancing, but it was a place to start. Speaking of canopies...

Any square png will work, but the image has to be distorted since it's going from a square to a hemisphere on the parachute. Photoshop or GIMP, it's Filter > Distort > Polar Coordinates... > Polar to Rectangle. .

Edited May 26, 2013 by Konraden
added DL link
Nice, I love the ability to customize the canopies.
YEEEEHAAAAAWW! I'm gonna install this when I get home!

I've always always always wanted a selection of parachutes of various drags and opening heights. Maybe a metal chute that can handle the high speeds of the upper atmosphere or a large drifter that opens at 20,000m for long duration measurements. The stock and even mod values leave huge gaps, especially the shock of opening from 5 to 500 drag at 500m. So dull.

This is a very nice mod, but nearly always, the 2.5 meter 'chutes will tear off. And that's when the only thing they're attached to is an orange tank and a mainsail. Maybe their drag is too high? Using drogue 'chutes might be a solution, but sadly, there is only one top per stack, so it isn't really that viable.

This is a very nice mod, but nearly always, the 2.5 meter 'chutes will tear off. And that's when the only thing they're attached to is an orange tank and a mainsail. Maybe their drag is too high? Using drogue 'chutes might be a solution, but sadly, there is only one top per stack, so it isn't really that viable.

I'm getting around to making drouge radials to match these. I have one already on these forums already which matches the stock radial parachute. My weekends are normally just busy so it takes me a while to catch up. I'll get some more work done later today if I can.

Or strut the canopies to the tank like they seem to do in RL.

I do like how you can use your own images on the canopied though. Will be fun....

I've always wanted to actually use drogue chutes on the smaller pod! Also, the customized canopies look nice, I'll have to give them a go.

Edited June 21, 2013 by firerider521

Mega bump.

I think this needs a revisit for smaller or bigger radials.

and radial drogues.
